Class YAMLParsingUtils

extends Object
    Utility methods used by YAML parsers.

      static void validateYAMLVersionTag(String actualTag, String expectedVersionTag)
      Validates that a YAML node's tag is matches the expected version tag, throwing an exception in the following cases: The node's tag is missing. The node's tag is not in the expected form. The node's tag contains a version that is not numeric. The node's tag contains a version that is older than the currently supported version. The node's tag contains a version that more recent than the currently supported version.

    • Method Detail

      • validateYAMLVersionTag

        public static void validateYAMLVersionTag(String actualTag,
                                          String expectedVersionTag)
        Validates that a YAML node's tag is matches the expected version tag, throwing an exception in the following cases:
        • The node's tag is missing.
        • The node's tag is not in the expected form.
        • The node's tag contains a version that is not numeric.
        • The node's tag contains a version that is older than the currently supported version.
        • The node's tag contains a version that more recent than the currently supported version.
        Parameters:
        actualTag - the node's tag to validate
        expectedVersionTag - the expected version tag
        Throws:
        VersionTagValidationException - indicates that the node's tag does not match expectations

      • yamlNameToJavaEnumValue

        public static <T extends Enum<T>> T yamlNameToJavaEnumValue(String yamlName,
                                                            Class<T> enumType)
        Converts a string encountered in a YAML file into an enum value. This conversion is based on the assumption that the Java enum value's name is obtained by converting all characters to upper case and replacing underscores by hyphens in the YAML value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the the target Java enum's type
        Parameters:
        yamlName - the YAML name identifying an enum value
        enumType - the type of the target Java enum value
        Returns:
        the corresponding enum value
        Throws:
        YAMLValidationException - if the corresponding Java enum value cannot be determined

      • yamlNameToJavaFieldName

        public static String yamlNameToJavaFieldName(String name)
        Java-ifies the given YAML name by eliminating hyphens and adding camel case.
        Parameters:
        name - the YAML name to java-ify
        Returns:
        the java-ified name
